name: Nithin Mukesh
position: Operations Manager at FENIX | Ex CIRC / BIRD | Ex Fetchr

current_company.name: FENIX
current_company.title: Operations Manager at FENIX | Ex CIRC / BIRD | Ex Fetchr

experience.title: Operations Manager - UAE
experience.description: - First hire and was part of the initial launch of FENIX in the GCC Market- Launched MyFENIX / MyRIDE (subscriptions) through out the GCC Market- Launched F10 vertical (fast deliveries - in 10 mins) using the micro mobility fleet in Abu Dhabi- Worked on setting up different warehouses across the UAE for running cost effective operations- Liaising with the government entities across the GCC to ensure that the requirements are met- Worked on optimizing the operations to ensure that the company stays profitable- Worked with various logistics partners to get the cargo on time to their respective destinations- Implemented operations synergies to ensure that the operations capacity is utilized fully onto the other verticals to reduce costs- Actively implementing and monitoring the KPI's of the department on a day to day basis- Constantly interacting with the subordinates to ensure that there are no gaps in the process which are set- Handling external vendors across various sectors such as car rental companies, logistics & other procurement related vendors- Implemented a hybrid shift plan for the operations team to use the operations efficiency across verticals and reduce costs- Launched FENIX Express, delivery platform for B2C & B2B deliveries.- Responsible for setting up the complete B2B & B2C processes.- Responsible for achieving +95% delivery performance since inception.
experience.description_html: - First hire and was part of the initial launch of FENIX in the GCC Market- Launched MyFENIX / MyRIDE (subscriptions) through out the GCC Market- Launched F10 vertical (fast deliveries - in 10 mins) using the micro mobility fleet in Abu Dhabi- Worked on setting up different warehouses across the UAE for running cost effective operations- Liaising with the government entities across the GCC to ensure that the requirements are met- Worked on optimizing the operations to ensure that the company stays profitable- Worked with various logistics partners to get the cargo on time to their respective destinations- Implemented operations synergies to ensure that the operations capacity is utilized fully onto the other verticals to reduce costs- Actively implementing and monitoring the KPI's of the department on a day to day basis- Constantly interacting with the subordinates to ensure that there are no gaps in the process which are set- Handling external vendors across various sectors such as car rental companies, logistics & other procurement related vendors- Implemented a hybrid shift plan for the operations team to use the operations efficiency across verticals and reduce costs- Launched FENIX Express, delivery platform for B2C & B2B deliveries.- Responsible for setting up the complete B2B & B2C processes.- Responsible for achieving +95% delivery performance since inception.

experience.title: Operations Data Analyst - Last Mile Operations
experience.description: - Working closely with the tech team for transition from ERP to a new built, which is specifically designed to enhance the operational work flow compared to ERP.- Working under the ERP tool and doing day to day performance analysis.- Involved in the capacity planning of the current fleet.- Preparing KPIâ€™s for the Last mile operations team.- Responsible for fleet and capacity planning for the last mile team depending on the projections provided by the sates team.- Incentives planning and formulating incentives for drivers and team leaders.- Extracting and preparing reports for analysis depending on different departments requests.- Weekly analysis on the overall operational performance.- Planned and implemented same day dispatch process.- Involved in automating the manual day to day processes with the tech team to switch from manual to automated tasks.- Maintaining Geofence and processing the geofence requests from all hubs across UAE.- Route Planning implementation on the driverâ€™s devices for the drivers to get their work done more efficiently.- Investigations on order issues and summarizing a detailed report.- Handling outsource vendors and providing information for their invoices.- Was a POC of a major client (AWOK.COM)- Received recognition for the best TL for the month twice and received a certificate of recognition and was named as Fetchr encyclopedia.- Communicating with upper management if major issues are found in the operations of the business.- Managing the UAE operations team and incident supervisors by assigning workloads and scheduling tasks to ensure smooth mobility operations.
experience.description_html: - Working closely with the tech team for transition from ERP to a new built, which is specifically designed to enhance the operational work flow compared to ERP.- Working under the ERP tool and doing day to day performance analysis.- Involved in the capacity planning of the current fleet.- Preparing KPIâ€™s for the Last mile operations team.- Responsible for fleet and capacity planning for the last mile team depending on the projections provided by the sates team.- Incentives planning and formulating incentives for drivers and team leaders.- Extracting and preparing reports for analysis depending on different departments requests.- Weekly analysis on the overall operational performance.- Planned and implemented same day dispatch process.- Involved in automating the manual day to day processes with the tech team to switch from manual to automated tasks.- Maintaining Geofence and processing the geofence requests from all hubs across UAE.- Route Planning implementation on the driverâ€™s devices for the drivers to get their work done more efficiently.- Investigations on order issues and summarizing a detailed report.- Handling outsource vendors and providing information for their invoices.- Was a POC of a major client (AWOK.COM)- Received recognition for the best TL for the month twice and received a certificate of recognition and was named as Fetchr encyclopedia.- Communicating with upper management if major issues are found in the operations of the business.- Managing the UAE operations team and incident supervisors by assigning workloads and scheduling tasks to ensure smooth mobility operations.
